parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries per page. If you specify **InstanceId**, this parameter does not take effect.

Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: OSType
parameters.description:
The operating system type of the instance. Valid values:

*   Windows
*   Linux
*   FreeBSD

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: >  This parameter will be removed in the future. We recommend that you use NextToken and MaxResults for a paged query.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: >  This parameter will be removed in the future. We recommend that you use NextToken and MaxResults for a paged query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) to query the most recent region list.
